verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, \add that\add* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of \w those|strong="G1565"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, as \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* preached the \w gospel|strong="G2097"\w*, the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* came \w upon|strong="G2186"\w* \add him\add* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w spake|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Tell|strong="G2036"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w what|strong="G4169"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* doest \w thou|strong="G4160"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*? \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w I will|strong="G2065"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2504"\+w* \+w ask|strong="G2065"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w* \+w thing|strong="G3056"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w answer|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w The baptism|strong="G0908"\+w* \+w of John|strong="G2491"\+w*, \+w was it|strong="G2258"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w of|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w men|strong="G0444"\+w*?\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w reasoned|strong="G4817"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w If|strong="G1437"\w* we shall \w say|strong="G2036"\w*, \w From|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*; he will \w say|strong="G2046"\w*, \w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* believed \w ye|strong="G4100"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*?

But \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* we \w say|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Of|strong="G1537"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*; \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* will \w stone|strong="G2642"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w be|strong="G1511"\w* persuaded \w that|strong="G3982"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w was|strong="G2076"\w* a \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, that they \w could|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w tell|strong="G1492"\w* \w whence|strong="G4159"\w* \add it was\add*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Neither|strong="G3761"\+w* \+w tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w what|strong="G4169"\+w* \+w authority|strong="G1849"\+w* \+w I do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w these things|strong="G5023"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* began \w he|strong="G0756"\w* to \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w parable|strong="G3850"\w*; \wj  \+w A certain|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w planted|strong="G5452"\+w* \+w a vineyard|strong="G0290"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w let|strong="G1554"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w forth|strong="G1554"\+w* \+w to husbandmen|strong="G1092"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w went into a far country|strong="G0589"\+w* \+w for a long|strong="G2425"\+w* \+w time|strong="G5550"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w at|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the season|strong="G2540"\+w* \+w he sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w a servant|strong="G1401"\+w* \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w the husbandmen|strong="G1092"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w they should give|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w the fruit|strong="G2590"\+w* \+w of the vineyard|strong="G0290"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w the husbandmen|strong="G1092"\+w* \+w beat|strong="G1194"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and sent|strong="G1821"\+w* \+add him\+add* \+w away|strong="G1821"\+w* \+w empty|strong="G2756"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w again|strong="G4369"\+w* \+w he sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w another|strong="G2087"\+w* \+w servant|strong="G1401"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w they beat|strong="G1194"\+w* \+w him also|strong="G2548"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w entreated|strong="G0818"\+w* \+add him\+add* \+w shamefully|strong="G0818"\+w*, \+w and sent|strong="G1821"\+w* \+add him\+add* \+w away|strong="G1821"\+w* \+w empty|strong="G2756"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w again|strong="G4369"\+w* \+w he sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w a third|strong="G5154"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w they wounded|strong="G5135"\+w* \+w him|strong="G5126"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w and cast|strong="G1544"\+w* \+add him\+add* \+w out|strong="G1544"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Then|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w said|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w the lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w of the vineyard|strong="G0290"\+w*, \+w What|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w shall I do|strong="G4160"\+w*? \+w I will send|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w beloved|strong="G0027"\+w* \+w son|strong="G5207"\+w*: \+w it may be|strong="G2481"\+w* \+w they will reverence|strong="G1788"\+w* \+add him\+add* \+w when they see|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w him|strong="G5126"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w when the husbandmen|strong="G1092"\+w* \+w saw|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w they reasoned|strong="G1260"\+w* \+w among|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w themselves|strong="G1438"\+w*, \+w saying|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w This|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w the heir|strong="G2818"\+w*: \+w come|strong="G1205"\+w*, \+w let us kill|strong="G0615"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w the inheritance|strong="G2817"\+w* \+w may be|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w ours|strong="G2257"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w So|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they cast|strong="G1544"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w out of|strong="G1854"\+w* \+w the vineyard|strong="G0290"\+w*, \+w and killed|strong="G0615"\+w* \+add him\+add*. \+w What|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w the lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w of the vineyard|strong="G0290"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w unto them|strong="G0846"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w He shall come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w destroy|strong="G0622"\+w* \+w these|strong="G5128"\+w* \+w husbandmen|strong="G1092"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w shall give|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w the vineyard|strong="G0290"\+w* \+w to others|strong="G0243"\+w*.\wj* And \w when|strong="G1161"\w* they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add it\add*, they \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, God \w forbid|strong="G1096"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w beheld|strong="G1689"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w What|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w then|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w is written|strong="G1125"\+w*, \+w The stone|strong="G3037"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w the builders|strong="G3618"\+w* \+w rejected|strong="G0593"\+w*, \+w the same|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w is become|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w the|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w head|strong="G2776"\+w* \+w of the corner|strong="G1137"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w Whosoever|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w shall fall|strong="G4098"\+w* \+w upon|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w that|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w stone|strong="G3037"\+w* \+w shall be broken|strong="G4917"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w whomsoever|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w it shall fall|strong="G4098"\+w*, \+w it will grind|strong="G3039"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w to powder|strong="G3039"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* to \w lay|strong="G1911"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w feared|strong="G5399"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w perceived|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he had \w spoken|strong="G2036"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w parable|strong="G3850"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w watched|strong="G3906"\w* \add him\add*, and sent \w forth|strong="G0649"\w* \w spies|strong="G1455"\w*, which should \w feign|strong="G5271"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* just \w men|strong="G1342"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they might take \w hold|strong="G1949"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w*, that \w so|strong="G2443"\w* they might \w deliver|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w power|strong="G0746"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w authority|strong="G1849"\w* of the \w governor|strong="G2232"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Master|strong="G1320"\w*, we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* thou \w sayest|strong="G3004"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w teachest|strong="G1321"\w* \w rightly|strong="G3723"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* acceptest \w thou|strong="G2983"\w* the \w person|strong="G4383"\w* \add of any\add*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w teachest|strong="G1321"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w truly|strong="G0225"\w*:

Is it \w lawful|strong="G1832"\w* for \w us|strong="G2254"\w* to \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w tribute|strong="G5411"\w* unto \w Cæsar|strong="G2541"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* he \w perceived|strong="G2657"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w craftiness|strong="G3834"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w tempt ye|strong="G3985"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w Shew|strong="G1925"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w* \+w a penny|strong="G1220"\+w*. \+w Whose|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w image|strong="G1504"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w superscription|strong="G1923"\+w* \+w hath it|strong="G2192"\+w*?\wj* They \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Cæsar’s|strong="G2541"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Render|strong="G0591"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G5106"\+w* \+w unto Cæsar|strong="G2541"\+w* \+w the things|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w which be Cæsar’s|strong="G2541"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w unto God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w the things|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w which be God’s|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w could|strong="G2480"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* take hold \w of|strong="G1949"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w* \w before|strong="G1726"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w marvelled|strong="G2296"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w answer|strong="G0612"\w*, and held their \w peace|strong="G4601"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* came \w to|strong="G4334"\w* \add him\add* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* of the \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* deny \w that|strong="G0483"\w* there \w is|strong="G1511"\w* any \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w*; and they \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Master|strong="G1320"\w*, \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w If|strong="G1437"\w* any \w man’s|strong="G5100"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w die|strong="G0599"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* a \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w die|strong="G0599"\w* without \w children|strong="G0815"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* should \w take|strong="G2983"\w* his \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* raise \w up|strong="G1817"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w* unto \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*.

There \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* a \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, and \w died|strong="G0599"\w* without \w children|strong="G0815"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* her to \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w* \w childless|strong="G0815"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* her; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* in like \w manner|strong="G5615"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*: and they \w left|strong="G2641"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w*.
\w Last|strong="G5305"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* \w whose|strong="G5101"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w* is \w she|strong="G1096"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* to \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answering|strong="G0611"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w The children|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of this|strong="G5127"\+w* \+w world|strong="G0165"\+w* \+w marry|strong="G1060"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w are given in marriage|strong="G1548"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w they which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w shall be accounted worthy|strong="G2661"\+w* \+w to obtain|strong="G5177"\+w* \+w that|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w world|strong="G0165"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the resurrection|strong="G0386"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w the dead|strong="G3498"\+w*, \+w neither|strong="G3777"\+w* \+w marry|strong="G1060"\+w*, \+w nor|strong="G3777"\+w* \+w are given in marriage|strong="G1548"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w Neither|strong="G3777"\+w* \+w can|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w they die|strong="G0599"\+w* \+w any more|strong="G2089"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w they are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w equal unto the angels|strong="G2465"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w the children|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w being|strong="G5607"\+w* \+w the children|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of the resurrection|strong="G0386"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Now|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w the dead|strong="G3498"\+w* \+w are raised|strong="G1453"\+w*, \+w even|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Moses|strong="G3475"\+w* \+w shewed|strong="G3377"\+w* \+w at|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w the bush|strong="G0942"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w he calleth|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w the Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w the God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w of Abraham|strong="G0011"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w of Isaac|strong="G2464"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w of Jacob|strong="G2384"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w he is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w a God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w of the dead|strong="G3498"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w of the living|strong="G2198"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w live|strong="G2198"\+w* \+w unto him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* of the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w answering|strong="G0611"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Master|strong="G1320"\w*, thou \w hast|strong="G2036"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*.
And after \w that|strong="G1161"\w* they \w durst|strong="G5111"\w* \w not|strong="G3765"\w* \w ask|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w any|strong="G3762"\w* \add question at all\add*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w How|strong="G4459"\+w* \+w say they|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w that Christ|strong="G5547"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1511"\+w* \+w David’s|strong="G1138"\+w* \+w son|strong="G5207"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w David|strong="G1138"\+w* \+w himself|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w saith|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the book|strong="G0976"\+w* \+w of Psalms|strong="G5568"\+w*, The \+nd \+w LORD|strong="G3588"\+w*\+nd* \+w said|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w unto my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w Lord|strong="G2962"\+w*, \+w Sit thou|strong="G2521"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w right hand|strong="G1188"\+w*,\wj*
\wj  \+w Till|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w I make|strong="G5087"\+w* \+w thine|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w enemies|strong="G2190"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w footstool|strong="G5286"\+w*.\wj*
